snippet: The company said it stopped new sales and marketing of Alert Energy Caffeine Gum as the Food and Drug Administration investigates the safety of added caffeine.
abstract: Wrigley says it is taking its new Alert Energy Caffeine Gum off the market temporarily while the Food and Drug Administration investigates safety of added caffeine; stops new sales and marketing of gum.
lead_paragraph: The company said it stopped new sales and marketing of Alert Energy Caffeine Gum as the Food and Drug Administration investigates the safety of added caffeine.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Inquiry Leads Wrigley to Halt ‘Energy Gum’ Sales
headline.main: F.D.A. Inquiry Leads Wrigley to Halt ‘Energy Gum’ Sales
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Inquiry Leads Wrigley to Halt ‘Energy Gum’ Sales
